verification_docs.checklist_description: To ensure the quality and safety of our platform, we require all teachers to verify their identity and credentials. Please review our regulatory requirements. Once all the documents are in place, our team will review them to ensure that your profile is fully verified. You can upload various documents here to prove your identity and qualifications as a teacher on our platform. Required documents are necessary for full platform access, while optional documents can enhance your profile. Please ensure all documents are clear, valid, and show the requested information. Illegible or incomplete documents will be rejected and may delay your verification process. For any questions, refer to the help section on the right.
verification_docs.required_docs_subtitle: These documents are mandatory for full platform access.
verification_docs.ordination_description: Proof of your ordination or service authorization.
verification_docs.proof_of_address_description: A recent utility bill or bank statement (issued within the last 3 months).
verification_docs.optional_docs_subtitle: Enhance your profile and credibility with additional documents.
verification_docs.academic_transcript_description: Your academic record from a recognized institution.
verification_docs.tracking_history_description: View your document submission and verification history.

welcome.title: Welcome to EOTY Platform
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to spiritual growth and community connection starts here.

0.title: Welcome to EOTY Platform
0.description: Visit the courses page and browse available courses.
0.content: Welcome! The EOTY Platform is your dedicated space to grow in the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo faith. Here, you will find authentic teachings, connect with fellow youth, and access spiritual resources curated just for you.

1.title: Your Personal Dashboard
1.description: Your central hub for learning and connection.
1.content: This is your home base. Quickly resume your last lesson, see upcoming events, and track your spiritual milestones. Everything you need is just a click away.

2.title: Discover Faith-Aligned Courses
2.description: Explore a catalog of courses designed to deepen your understanding.
2.content: Browse our extensive catalog of courses, from Bible studies to Liturgical education. Filter by topic or difficulty to find the perfect starting point for your journey.

3.title: Connect in Fellowship
3.description: Join a safe and supportive community of peers.
3.content: You are not alone on this journey. Join your chapter's forum to ask questions, share reflections, and build lasting friendships with other youth members.

4.title: Explore the Resource Library
4.description: Access a wealth of authentic spiritual materials.
4.content: Dive into our library of books, articles, and multimedia resources. Whether you need study materials or daily inspiration, you'll find it here.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers, guides, and support
help.noFaqsFound: No FAQs found matching your search

contactSupport.title: Contact Support
contactSupport.description: Get help from our support team

q1.question: How do I enroll in a course?
q1.answer: To enroll in a course, go to the Browse Courses page, find a course you're interested in, and click the "Enroll" button.

q2.question: How do I track my progress?
q2.answer: Your progress is automatically tracked as you complete lessons.

q3.question: Can I bookmark lessons?
q3.answer: Yes! Click the bookmark icon to save it for later.

q4.question: How do study groups work?
q4.answer: Study groups allow you to collaborate with other students. You can create your own group or join existing public groups.

q5.question: What if I have technical issues?
q5.answer: If you experience technical issues, please contact support using the contact form below.

q6.question: How do I reset my password?
q6.answer: To reset your password, go to the Sign In page and click "Forgot Password".

q7.question: Can I download course materials?
q7.answer: Course materials availability depends on the course. Some courses may offer downloadable resources.

q8.question: How are points and achievements calculated?
q8.answer: You earn points by completing lessons, quizzes, and maintaining study streaks.

tags.merge_warning_text: The source tag will be permanently deleted after merging.
